titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for State and local income and property taxes under the alternative minimum tax.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for State and local income and property taxes under the alternative minimum tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the tax deduction for state and local income and property taxes as an adjustment in computing alternative minium taxable income.
